metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10687 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in all versions of Undertow before Undertow2.2.0.Final, where HTTP request smuggling related to CVE-2017-2666 ispossible against HTTP/1.x and HTTP/2 due to permitting invalid charactersin an HTTP request. This flaw allows an attacker to poison a web-cache,perform an XSS attack, or obtain sensitive information from request otherthan their own.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
